intro_text: r_c looks at the small stream they have to cross to continue on to mark the border, and debates if they should stop for a quick swim to cool off.
decline_text: r_c decides to continue with the patrol instead.

success_outcomes.text: They stop to swim for a few moments and feel rejuvenated, cooled and ready to continue.
They keep going, responsibly, although instead of leaping the little stream r_c wades through it, letting the water cool their paws pleasantly.

fail_outcomes.text: They get distracted while splashing in the water. r_c swears they saw a fish, but it derails their border patrol completely and they get nothing done.
